item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/05/13/email-and-privacy/#comment-4347">Jim Vanderveen</a>.
I'm both fascinated and saddened by the idea of privacy as a competitive advantage.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jim Vanderveen.

I’m both fascinated and saddened by the idea of privacy as a competitive advantage.

item.title: By: Jim Vanderveen

item.description: Thanks for posting this! I hadn't heard about the Riseup seizure. Disturbing...
item.content:encoded: Thanks for posting this! I hadn’t heard about the Riseup seizure. Disturbing…
